about_the_game:
Unit Down Charge is a futuristic action rail-shooter! Action packed, and full of quirky character dialogues, unique level designs, fully animated story cutscenes, and challenging boss battles!



Unit Down Charge combines the arcade difficulty of a Cabal Shooter and the level-based progression of a Rail Shooter, creating a game with colorful characters, diverse levels, and lighthearted story.

Features:
  • Quick arcade-styled shooting and dodging.
  • Character swap-out mechanic at any time!
  • Fully voiced dialogue from allies and enemies.
  • Animated in-game cutscenes!
  • Unique and intense boss battles, each with unique personalities.
  • Engaging story with progressive character growth!

THANK YOU

Thank you for your support and hope you are excited to play Unit Down Charge!

name: Unit Down Charge Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
